===Etymology===

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=gǔbǎn

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# two instruments played together by a single player: a small drum played with a stick in one hand, and a hardwood or bamboo [[clapper]] played by the other hand, used to accompany traditional Chinese music
